name: Glare
description: You stare into the depths of a creatureâ€™s eyes with intense ferocity. The creature must make a WIS saving throw against your Move DC or become frightened for the duration. A creature frightened in this way must make a WIS save against your Move DC at the end of each of its turns to remove the effect.

contest.effect: Badly startles all of the Pokemon to act before the user.
